span.span: The type of elements in the collection.

summary.span: 表示一个动态数据集合，它可在添加、删除项目或刷新整个列表时提供通知。

span.span: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，您使用的数据是对象的集合。In many cases the data that you work with is a collection of objects. 例如，数据绑定中的常见方案是使用 、 或等 来显示记录集合。For example, a common scenario in data binding is to use an such as a , , or to display a collection of records. 你可以枚举实现 接口的任何集合。You can enumerate over any collection that implements the interface. 但是，若要设置动态绑定，以便集合中的插入或删除操作 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 自动更新，该集合必须实现 接口。However, to set up dynamic bindings so that insertions or deletions in the collection update the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automatically, the collection must implement the interface. 此接口公开 事件，即每当基础集合发生更改时应引发的事件。This interface exposes the event, an event that should be raised whenever the underlying collection changes. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供 类，该类是实现接口的数据集合的内置实现 。provides the class, which is a built-in implementation of a data collection that implements the interface. 在实现自己的集合前，请考虑使用 或现有集合类之一，例如 、 和 等。Before implementing your own collection, consider using or one of the existing collection classes, such as , , and , among many others. 如果你有一个高级方案，并且想要实现自己的集合，请考虑使用 ，它提供可按索引单独访问的对象的非泛型集合。If you have an advanced scenario and want to implement your own collection, consider using , which provides a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index. 实现 可为数据绑定引擎提供最佳性能。Implementing provides the best performance with the data binding engine. > [!NOTE] > 若要完全支持将数据值从绑定源对象传输到绑定目标，则集合中支持可绑定属性的每个对象都必须实现相应的属性更改通知机制，例如 接口。To fully support transferring data values from binding source objects to binding targets, each object in your collection that supports bindable properties must implement an appropriate property changed notification mechanism such as the interface. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)中的 "绑定到集合"。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview). ## 有关 XAML 使用情况的说明Notes on XAML Usage 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 版本3.0 和3.5 中，可用作中的 XAML 对象元素。 can be used as a XAML object element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], in versions 3.0 and 3.5. 然而，使用情况却有很大的限制。However, the usage has substantial limitations. - 必须是根元素，因为 `x:TypeArguments` 仅在根元素的对象元素上支持必须用于指定泛型的约束类型的特性。 must be the root element, because the `x:TypeArguments` attribute that must be used to specify the constrained type of the generic is only supported on the object element for the root element. - 必须声明一个 `x:Class` 特性 (该特性要求该 xaml 文件的生成操作必须是 `Page` 或其他一些生成操作，该操作将编译 XAML) 。You must declare an `x:Class` attribute (which entails that the build action for this XAML file must be `Page` or some other build action that compiles the XAML). - 位于命名空间和程序集中，最初不会映射到默认的 XML 命名空间。 is in a namespace and assembly that are not initially mapped to the default XML namespace. 必须映射命名空间和程序集的前缀，然后在的对象元素标记中使用该前缀 。You must map a prefix for the namespace and assembly, and then use that prefix on the object element tag for . 在应用程序中使用 XAML 的功能更为直接的方法是声明自己的非泛型自定义集合类，该类派生自 ，并将其限制为特定类型。A more straightforward way to use capabilities from XAML in an application is to declare your own non-generic custom collection class that derives from , and constrains it to a specific type. 然后，映射包含此类的程序集，并将其作为 XAML 中的对象元素进行引用。Then map the assembly that contains this class, and reference it as an object element in your XAML.

remarks.format: ## Examples 典型的用法是在 范围内包装调用 `using` ，如以下示例中所示：The typical usage is to wrap an call within a `using` scope, as in the following example: [!code-csharp[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/CSharp/DataSource.cs#blockreentrancy)] [!code-vb[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/visualbasic/datasource.vb#blockreentrancy)]

exception.span: 如果调用了 ，其中尚未释放 返回值。

span.span: If there was a call to of which the return value has not yet been disposed of.

exception.span: 通常情况下，这意味着在发生 事件时更多次尝试更改此集合。

span.span: Typically, this means when there are additional attempts to change this collection during a event.

exception.span: 但是，这取决于派生的类何时选择调用 。

span.span: However, it depends on when derived classes choose to call .

span.span: Removes all items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除列表时，基类将调用此方法。The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared. 此实现将引发 事件。This implementation raises the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅 基类的方法 。For more information, see the method of the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改此集合的属性和方法 通过此方法引发事件 `virtual` 。Properties and methods that modify this collection raise the event through this `virtual` method. ## Examples 重写此方法时，调用基实现或使用 方法来处理可重入集合更改，如以下示例中所示：When overriding this method, either call the base implementation or use the method to handle reentrant collection changes, as in the following example: [!code-csharp[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/CSharp/DataSource.cs#blockreentrancy)] [!code-vb[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/visualbasic/datasource.vb#blockreentrancy)]
